content.title: Then I turned and noticed, behind me—a third chair.
content.author: Henrik Karlsson
content.quote_text: Then I turned and noticed, behind me — a third chair.

generation.prompt: Claude Monet style impressionist technique with broken visible brushstrokes capturing fleeting effects of light and atmosphere, colors that interact and influence each other optically, emphasis on temporal specificity and momentary atmospheric conditions, loose brushwork suggesting form through color temperature and value. Capturing the vibe of gratitude, doubt, willingness to persevere. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
